text:
Its about tyme that this #JohnBlock issue is sorted!

Grayston bridge collapse  WTH
2 people died "@Tlouu_Kganyago: Co-asks"@MohaleMotaung_: Kanti people died on this tremor? #bridgecollapse""
Due to #BridgeCollapse uber is giving free rides to the Gauteng Stations.
If a "gust of wind" is enough to make a bridge collapse... then I fear for my life each time I leave the house #GraystonBridge
#bridge collapse: additional metrorail, Gautrain and bus services tomorrow morning.Also use alternative roads-N14/R55/old Pretoria road
My thoughts is with the families of those fatally involved in Grayston bridge collapse.
@CityofJoburgZA: Catch our #Joburgecomobility park & rides tomorrow #Bridgecollapse ecomobility @EWNTraffic @TrafficSA @itra
